value:
I am looking forward to this. It has
been ages since I last attended a
festival.

With Duma freed from his madness,
peace has come to Valentia.
My deepest wish has been fulfilled.

The gods have chosen you. They
would not ask greatness of you if you
could not achieve it.

I want to learn more about you, but
I also want to see the festivities...
Let's talk while we explore, shall we?

Is there something here that would
make a good souvenir for my son
or my nephew? Hmm...

I come bearing gratitude and well
wishes from your friend
$Nf.

I think my son will appreciate this gift.
Thank you for your help selecting it.

This is the gift you would suggest
for my nephew? Hmm... A good
suggestion, if a little uninspired.

Ultimately I was uncertain what
present might suit your fancy.

Thank you for this gift. I accept it
with gratitude.

I am Rudolf, Emperor of Rigel. I have
come from another world. Was it you
who summoned me to this one?

Rigel's cold climate posed challenges
for agriculture, forcing my people to
shoulder scarcity and sacrifice.$k$pIt will come as no surprise, then,
that we were at our happiest during
festivals—rare times of indulgence.$k$pOnly on such days would you hear
children's delighted squeals echoing
through the castle.$k$pUntil the day I sent newborn Alm
away, of course. Then the laughter
died.$k$pAfter that I shunned festivals and
even turned away from my nephew,
unable to look my decision in the eye.$k$pI was weak. No... I am weak. For a
fleeting moment, you have made a
weak man's dreams come true.$k$pAnd for that kindness you have my
deepest thanks.
はあっ
くらえ！
ぐっ…
小癪な…
It's all for you!
The Day of Devotion!
Think nothing of it!
It's a holiday! Relax!
I've...grown old...
ふう…
I am Rudolf, Emperor of Rigel. It was brave of you to summon me...
I am in a congenial mood, but let's not get too friendly.
This dagger is a gift for my son. Of course, my nephew must have an identical one, or he will be cross...
I am...unaccustomed to discussing my feelings openly.
Berkut was such a shy lad...always hiding behind the columns in the throne room.
Alm...you will be a just king. Remain strong.
I seldom take holidays. How should we spend the time?
Very well.
Your advice?
I will go.
